subject: Re: [junit] Unable to run the Junit Tests.
msgSnippet: ... The parameter to the test runner must be the name of the class (including its packages). java -cp /path/to/junit.jar;/path/to/your/code
messageBody:
syerrave wrote:
> Hi,
> I have a class file with all the tests in a suite and the path and
> classpath are set.The classpath has the "." But when I execute the
> follwoing
>
> java junit.swingui.testRunner Opt.class

The parameter to the test runner must be the name of the class
(including its packages).

java -cp /path/to/junit.jar;/path/to/your/code junit.swingui.TestRunner
com.mycompany.Opt
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
